starting_location.plaintext: The Chasm's Maw , The Chasm , Liyue

steps.plaintext: Look for offerings to place before the memorial (0/6)
steps.markdown: Look for offerings to place before the memorial (0/6)

substeps.plaintext: All items can be obtained before starting this quest.
substeps.markdown: All items can be obtained before starting this quest.

substeps.plaintext: Flower of Farsight: Climb the mountains behind the Statue of The Seven using the chasm rocks to boost your jumps. Investigate the rock and you will find Tang Wuchou. Collecting the Flower of Farsight will automatically start the world quest A Cliff-Side Hero's Past.
substeps.markdown: ◀Flower of Farsight▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Flower_of_Farsight▷: Climb the mountains behind the Statue of The Seven using the chasm rocks to boost your jumps. Investigate the rock and you will find ◀Tang Wuchou▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Tang_Wuchou▷. Collecting the Flower of Farsight will automatically start the world quest ◀A Cliff-Side Hero's Past▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/A_Cliff-Side_Hero%27s_Past▷.

substeps.plaintext: Skyfeather: Found at the cliff of Glaze Peak. Teleport to Tiangong Gorge and go over to Glaze Peak.
substeps.markdown: ◀Skyfeather▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Skyfeather▷: Found at the cliff of ◀Glaze Peak▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Glaze_Peak▷. Teleport to ◀Tiangong Gorge▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Tiangong_Gorge▷ and go over to Glaze Peak.

substeps.plaintext: Cup of Commons: Open the Precious Chest from the World Quest Undetected Infiltration.
substeps.markdown: ◀Cup of Commons▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Cup_of_Commons▷: Open the Precious Chest from the World Quest ◀Undetected Infiltration▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Undetected_Infiltration▷.

substeps.plaintext: Sundial of Ages: Found by heading northwest of The Surface's teleport waypoint. Investigate the bowl and you will get the item.
substeps.markdown: ◀Sundial of Ages▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Sundial_of_Ages▷: Found by heading northwest of ◀The Surface▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Surface▷'s teleport waypoint. Investigate the bowl and you will get the item.

substeps.plaintext: Helm of Warding: Located in The Chasm's Maw. Follow a nearby Seelie into the wooden house and down the hole, then enter the next room over. Burn the hay using Pyro or the nearby Exploding Barrels to reveal two investigation points, one of which yields the Helm of Warding.
substeps.markdown: ◀Helm of Warding▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Helm_of_Warding▷: Located in The Chasm's Maw. Follow a nearby ◀Seelie▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Seelie▷ into the wooden house and down the hole, then enter the next room over. Burn the hay using Pyro or the nearby ◀Exploding Barrels▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Exploding_Barrel▷ to reveal two investigation points, one of which yields the Helm of Warding.

substeps.plaintext: Warrior's Spear: Head to the The Chasm's Maw waypoint and go to the mountain southeast from it. Climb to the top and the spear will be there along with two Sweet Flowers.
substeps.markdown: ◀Warrior's Spear▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Warrior%27s_Spear▷: Head to the The Chasm's Maw waypoint and go to the mountain southeast from it. Climb to the top and the spear will be there along with two Sweet Flowers.

steps.plaintext: Offer the items before the memorial
steps.markdown: Offer the items before the memorial

substeps.plaintext: There is one Luxurious Chest and a full set of 4★ Tenacity of the Millelith artifacts.
substeps.markdown: There is one ◀Luxurious Chest▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Luxurious_Chest▷ and a full set of 4★ ◀Tenacity of the Millelith▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Tenacity_of_the_Millelith▷ artifacts.

steps.plaintext: Talk to Wang about the treasure
steps.markdown: Talk to Wang about the treasure
